com.mindfusion.charting

Class SeriesRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.SeriesRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataChangedListener, SeriesContainer, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FunnelRenderer, PieRenderer, RadarRenderer, Renderer2D, TowerRenderer

    public abstract class SeriesRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SeriesContainer, DataChangedListener
    Base class for renderer objects that draw data series inside a Plot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Initializes a new instance of the SeriesRenderer class.

      • effectiveFill

        public com.mindfusion.drawing.Brush effectiveFill(int seriesIndex,
                                                  int dataIndex,
                                                  RenderContext context)
        Gets the brush that should be used to fill the representation of specified data item.
        Parameters:
        seriesIndex - An integer index of a Series within the list of series rendered by this SeriesRenderer.
        dataIndex - An integer index of the data item in specified series.
        context - A RenderContext instance.
        Returns:
        A Brush instance.

                               RenderContext context)

        context - A RenderContext instance used to access styles and theme from the dashboard hierarchy.
        Returns:
        A SeriesStyle instance, or null if none meets spcified criteria.
